resources.string: Click to roll the die.\nEvery time you hit a six, you earn five coins.

The rules for Two or more game are as follows: 

 1. If you select 2 Alike and put a bet value then the four dices are rolled and if you get 2 of the values same on dices then the win value is twice your bet value. 

 2. If you select 3 Alike and put a bet value then the four dices are rolled and if you get 3 of the values same on dices then the win value is thrice your bet value. 

 3. If you select 4 Alike and put a bet value then the four dices are rolled and if you get 4 of the values same on dices then the win value is four times your bet value. 

 4. If you lose the game then according to your option as 2 Alike, 3 Alike, or 4 Alike your balance will be deducted the respective number of times your bet value.
